definition: Poland/Polish/abbr. for 波蘭|波兰[Bo1 lan2]
special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: It is used to set baud rate, parity check, number of data bits, stop bit.
sentences.chinese: 它是用来设置波特率，奇偶校验，数据位数，停止位。

sentences.english: Show the current speed of the remote connection.
sentences.chinese: 显示远程连接的当前波特率。

sentences.english: What baud rate, or range of baud rates, is supported?
sentences.chinese: 是否支持波特率或波特率的范围？

sentences.english: What baud rate, or range of baud rates, is supported?
sentences.chinese: 是否支持波特率或波特率的范围？

sentences.english: The problem with your UART baudrate may be clock related.
sentences.chinese: 您的UART波特率问题可能是系统时钟造成的。

sentences.english: Don't try setting the baud rate on a directory, for example.
sentences.chinese: 例如，不要尝试在目录上设置波特率。

sentences.english: This switch sets baudrate of the debug port.
sentences.chinese: 该开关设置调试端口的波特率。

sentences.english: Baud Rate, Word Length, Stop Bits, and Parity are adjustable from the keypad.
sentences.chinese: 波特率，字长，停止位和校验是在面板上调节。

sentences.english: The baud rate of the machine is the number of symbols per second transferred.
sentences.chinese: 计算机的波特率是指每秒传输的符号数目。

sentences.english: There are constraints on the CPU clock speed related to the baud rate.
sentences.chinese: 波特率会对CPU时钟速度产生限制。

sentences.english: MCU code is set to 4800 baud.
sentences.chinese: 代码中单片机的波特率设置为4800。

definition: to address/to search for address/to input data into memory
